title: Bandola
text:
The bandola is one of many varieties of small pear-shape <a href="chordophone">chordophone</a>s found in <a href="Venezuela">Venezuela</a> and <a href="Colombia">Colombia</a>. They are related to the <a href="bandurria">bandurria</a> and <a href="mandolin">mandolin</a>. 
Traditional varieties.
Instruments known as "bandola" include:
